'''1.13.2-pre1''' is the first pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.13.2]] released on October 16, 2018,<ref>{{link|url=http://web.archive.org/web/20181016151005/https://minecraft.net/en-us/article/minecraft-java-edition-1132|dead-url=y|title=Minecraft Java Edition 1.13.2|date=October 16, 2018|website=[[Minecraft.net]]}}</ref> which includes a few performance and upgrade issue fixes that were left over from [[Java Edition 1.13.1]].

== Changes ==
=== General ===
* Improved performance of upgrading [[world]]s.
* Improved performance of [[turtle]] pathfinding.
* Improved startup time.
* Improved [[mob]] spawning performance.
* Other general performance improvements.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.13.2-pre1|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|91621|Mobs repetitively despawn and respawn rapidly at high Y coordinates (causing lag).
|134115|Containers next to chunk borders can lose items when upgrading.
}}</onlyinclude>
